text: Michael J. Rogers (born June 2, 1963) is an American former law enforcement officer and politician. He was the U.S. representative for from 2001 to 2015. He is a member of the Republican Party. He was a CNN national security news commentator. Rogers was a candidate for the U.S. Senate in the 2024 election. He lost the election in November 2024 to Democratic congresswoman Elissa Slotkin. In April 2025, Rogers announced his candidacy for open U.S. Senate seat in 2026. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Michigan Category:Writers from Michigan Category:American political commentators Category:CNN people Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Mike Rogers (Michigan politician)
